title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Opportunities     Volunteer                Science & Research Volunteer Opportunities       Volunteers play an integral role every year at Cape Cod National Seashore and in National Parks throughout America. Volunteers fill many varied positions at the seashore each year. If you are interested in learning more about volunteering please visit the Cape Cod National Seashore Volunteer page. International Volunteers Cape Cod National Seashore welcomes international volunteers. If you are a college or university student, an employee for a non-U.S. park agency, or if you have a background in an environmental or cultural resources field, and an interest in volunteering for the U.S. National Park Service - we want to hear from you! International volunteers at Cape Cod National Seashore can expect to gain valuable experience in one of America's most treasured landscapes offering. For more information, please visit the NPS International Volunteer in Parks page.  Â     A science volunteer works with an RTK unit at Hatches Harbor. NPS
